name: CondorChain
description: CondorChain is an EVM-based decentralized, scalable blockchain made specially to help Defi and GameFi projects thrive. CondorChain runs using a high-performance Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus algorithm. CondorChain is the first and only blockchain focusing on a specific segment; built for DeFi, GameFi and NFT projects. Without any direct competition, CondorChain is set to gather the right community and help them flourish.
